mod.description: Adds an inventory to the ship, allowing it to store items and retrieve them.

unlockName.name: Unlock Name
unlockName.description:
Determines the text to type in order to unlock the chute.

Note that some texts like 'inventory' can already been taken by other unlockables.

unlockCost.name: Unlock Cost
unlockCost.description: Determines how expensive it is to unlock the chute.

command.name: Inventory Command
command.description: Determines the command to type to access the ship's inventory.

inventorySortOrder.name: Inventory Sort Order
inventorySortOrder.description: Determines in what order the items are displayed in the inventory.

buy.main:
You have requested to order the ship's inventory.
Total cost of item: [totalCost].

Please CONFIRM or DENY.
buy.confirm: The Company congratulates you on successfully acquiring the ship’s inventory. You can access it by entering {command} into the terminal. - Important Safety Notice - For the safety of all personnel, placing fellow employees inside the inventory is strictly prohibited. Violations will result in salary deductions or immediate termination of employment.

locked.message: We are sorry to inform you that you <color=red>do not</color> possess the required equipment on board to utilize this function.
locked.tip: Please consider buying or restoring the inventory by typing '{command}'.
locked.offer: If funds are hard to gather, the Company can suggest a therapist to help you or offer you a loan that will span on several generations.

main.home: Select the desired action to execute from the provided list:

confirm.message: Do you really want to proceed?
confirm.warning: The Company and its Partners <color=red>will not</color> be responsible for your poor decisions.

single.message: From the list below, please select the item you would like to retrieve:

type.confirm: You are about to retrieve {amount} instances of '{name}'.

all.message: You are about to retrieve {amount} items, for a total of ${total}.
